tier.item: (2.30) a. Lao Zhang mingming zhidao Wang Huan (Lao Wang de erzi)

ba neixie lingjian nazoule, keshi yao zugou de zhengju

cai neng gaosu Lao Wangi zijii de erzi zai tou dongxi.

was stealing things.
